ul.li: Numbers 1 to 9 are used for this game.\n
Player 1 must only enter odd numbers.\n
Player 2 must only enter even numbers.\n
The player who puts down 15 points in a line, wins.
Either player can place a X or an O on each move.\n
The first player to create a line of X or O, wins.
Player 1 begins, each player takes turns placing an X on the board.\n
When a player creates a three-in-a-row, that player loses.
